original_text: When the large crowd of the Jews learned that Jesus was there, they came, not only on account of him but also to see Lazarus, whom he had raised from the dead.
korean_text: 유대인의 큰 무리가 예수께서 여기 계신 줄을 알고 오니 이는 예수만 보기 위함이 아니요 죽은 자 가운데서 살리신 나사로도 보려 함이러라

sentences.original_text: When the large crowd of the Jews learned
not only on account of him
whom he had raised from the dead
sentences.korean_translation: 예수께서 죽은 자 가운데서 살리신 그 나사로를
